title: I am unable to cast my phone screen to my lg tv. I have google pixel 3 phone and lg smart tv (LB6350)
content: Trying to connect my phone to lg tv for screen sharing. I have tried everything. My phone is unable to search my tv. They both are connected to same wifi network. Everything is on like location, Bluetooth, notification on my phone. Am I supposed to buy Chromecast to connect or there is any other way to fix this issue?
